descriptionHtml:
Name: Targaryen
Race: Nord
Level: 1 (enough experience to reach level 5)
Location: Helgen (unlocked Whiterun and went back to Helgen to save and make screenshots)
Inventory: Hunting bow, Iron arrows, Iron sword, full hide set and some random crap
Gold: 2.6k
Quests completed: Just the starting quest (went with the Stormcloaks)
Quests accepted: Companions and the main quest from Gerdur

I've been trying for so long to create a (good looking) male character,
I'm happy with the result and I wanted to share him with the community.

Feel free to leave a comment and let me know what you think!



Required Mod:

Fine Face Textures for Men by Urshi
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27815/?

(I have no idea what he will look like without the mod mentioned above
but i think it's safe to say he will be one ugly motherfucker)



Other mods used in the pictures:

The Eyes Of Beauty by Gabriel Mailhot (for the blue eyes)
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?

Beards by Hvergelmir
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28363/?

SPOA Silver Knight Armor by dopalacz
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32275/?

SPOA Silver Knight Shield by dopalacz and FrankFamily
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34496/?



Some mods I like:

Glimmer by Elvarheim
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36535/?

Torch Arrows by Joolander
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23574/?

Stickier Arrows by TerrifyingToddler
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14532/?

Demon Hunter Armor by Jojjo
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42169/?

Demon Hunter Armor - Retextures by andreamkall
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42332/?

Enhanced Blood Textures by dDefinder
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60/?

Realistic Ragdolls and Force by dDefinder
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/601/?
author: Nurgles
